attributes.action: limit the number of EU and NON-EU imagrunts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the Prime minister should put a limit of the number of EU/NON-EU imagrunts that enter the UK each year. Doing this will ensure that there are jobs left for the UK citizens rather than letting them flod into the UK not being able to speak very good english and working for far less than the min wage and forcing everyday UK citizens having to either go on income support or live off their family's

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
